statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email_address, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND behavior_type IN ('open', 'click');
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns WHERE behavior_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_email_campaigns;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT user_name, user_age FROM users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_age, user_gender FROM users ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM user_behavior ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_gender FROM users WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_email, user_name, user_age FROM users WHERE user_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY user_age ASC;

SELECT user_id, user_name, user_age, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM users JOIN user_behavior ON users.user_id = user_behavior.user_id WHERE user_age < 40 AND behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND user_gender = 'Female';
SELECT users.*, user_behavior.behavior_details FROM users LEFT JOIN user_behavior ON users.user_id = user_behavior.user_id WHERE user_age < 30 ORDER BY user_age ASC, behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT email, behavior_type FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click';
SELECT behavior_description, timestamp FROM user_behavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_email, open_status, click_count FROM campaign_results WHERE open_status = true ORDER BY click_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_behavior;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_segment, email_subject FROM email_campaigns WHERE target_segment IN ('Segment A', 'Segment B');
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, recipient_email, delivery_status, open_status, click_count FROM campaign_results WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' AND conversion_rate > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, signup_date FROM users ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE signup_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT u.user_name, c.campaign_name FROM users u JOIN campaign_targets ct ON u.user_id = ct.user_id JOIN campaigns c ON ct.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE ct.target_segment = 'VIP';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_targets ON campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_targets.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, email, first_name, last_name FROM users;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions;
SELECT campaign_id, sent_count, opened_count, clicked_count FROM campaign_stats;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_actions ON users.user_id = user_actions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE created_by = 1 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(action_id) AS total_actions FROM user_actions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_actions > 5;

SELECT campaign_name, opened_count, clicked_count FROM campaigns c JOIN campaign_stats cs ON c.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id WHERE opened_count > 100 AND clicked_count > 50 ORDER BY opened_count DESC, clicked_count DESC;
